trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de pintura do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ChartPaintEventArgs é usado para definir as propriedades do gráfico durante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>propriedade permite que você posicione os elementos do gráfico e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>propriedade facilita as operações de desenho GDI+.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>propriedade fornece o acesso de desenvolvedor para a raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto, que pode ser usado para definir várias propriedades do gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do gráfico permite que o desenvolvedor definir as propriedades do gráfico durante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the hart element.
Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade do objeto durante um evento de pintura para:-ajuda com a conversão em coordenadas relativas e/ou absoluto do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade do objeto durante um evento de pintura para posicionar um elemento de gráfico.
